ai-patthana15.81:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, and constantly preciously,
ai-patthana15.81:1.1_0: Also the teaching doesn’t give rise to a cause or reason.
ai-patthana15.81:2.1_0: One who has not conflict with the principles, without cause,
ai-patthana15.81:3.1_0: Without measurelessness, without limitlessness, there is no cause or condition.
